io.github.ahyattdev.unixpermissionvisualizer

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ahyattdev.unixpermissionvisualizer.UserInterface

  • public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    The class responsible for creating the GUI.
    Author:
    Andrew Hyatt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javax.swing.JTextField display
      The JTextfield responsible for displaying the 4 permission octals.
      (package private) javax.swing.JFrame frame
      The main JFrame.
      (package private) PermissionPanel group
      A JPanel representing the group permission octal.
      (package private) PermissionPanel other
      A JPanel representing the other permission octal.
      (package private) SpecialPanel special
      A JPanel representing the special permission octal.
      (package private) PermissionPanel user
      A JPanel representing the user permission octal.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createAndShowGUI()
      Creates and displays the main JFrame.
      (package private) int[] getNumbers()
      Creates the four Unix permission octals from the checkboxes and puts them in an array.
      (package private) java.lang.String getStringRep()
      Combines the four elements of the array returned by getNumbers() into String that is suitable for presenting to the user.
      (package private) void updateField()
      Updates the contents of display with contents that is generated from the checkboxes.

    • Field Detail

      • frame

        javax.swing.JFrame frame
        The main JFrame. It is null until createAndShowGUI() is called.

      • display

        javax.swing.JTextField display
        The JTextfield responsible for displaying the 4 permission octals.

      • special

        SpecialPanel special
        A JPanel representing the special permission octal.

      • user

        PermissionPanel user
        A JPanel representing the user permission octal.

        A JPanel representing the group permission octal.

        A JPanel representing the other permission octal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserInterface

        public UserInterface()

    • Method Detail

      • createAndShowGUI

        public void createAndShowGUI()
        Creates and displays the main JFrame.
        See Also:
        SpecialPanel, PermissionPanel

      • getNumbers

        int[] getNumbers()
        Creates the four Unix permission octals from the checkboxes and puts them in an array.
        Returns:
        An int array with four elements. The first is the special octal, second is the user octal, third is the group octal and fourth is the other octal.
        See Also:
        PermissionPanel, SpecialPanel

      • getStringRep

        java.lang.String getStringRep()
        Combines the four elements of the array returned by getNumbers() into String that is suitable for presenting to the user.
        Returns:
        A string that is suitable for presenting to the user.

      • updateField

        void updateField()
        Updates the contents of display with contents that is generated from the checkboxes.
